name: Flashpackers Hervey Bay
description:
Our vibrant hostel is designed with backpackers and travelers in mind, offering a social and comfortable environment to make your stay enjoyable. Here’s what you can look forward to:

Facilities:
-Free Wi-Fi to stay connected
-Cinema Room for movie nights
-Swimming Pool with sun loungers to unwind
-Common Areas for socializing and relaxing
Location:
-4-minute walk to Scarness Beach
-7-minute drive to Urangan Pier and Vic Hislop's Shark Show
-9-minute drive to Reef World Aquarium
Weekly Social Events:
-BBQ Night 
-Cheese and Wine Night
-Movie & Popcorn Night
-Games Night
Accommodation:
-Choose from private rooms and dormitories, with some rooms offering access to communal bathroom facilities. All rooms include bed linen, towels, and pillows.

Tour Desk:
-Book exciting whale-watching cruises and Fraser Island tours at our tour desk.

Shuttle Service to/from Greyhound Bus Station or Airport:
-$5 per person each way for scheduled pick-ups and drop-offs at 10 AM and 5 PM
-$10 per person for transfers outside these hours
-Airport transfers available for $10 per person
Check-In Requirements:
-Valid passport
-Phone number
-Valid credit card for a $25 deposit, covering potential lost key charges

Whether you're gearing up for an adventure to Fraser Island or exploring the local area, Hervey Bay Flashpackers offers comfort, accessibility, and a welcoming atmosphere perfect for backpackers and adventurers alike. Enjoy your stay with us!

HERVEY BAY FLASHPACKERS TERMS & CONDITIONS  
Cancellations made 48 hours prior to the date of your arrival will be charged 1 night . 

If you do not show up as per the reservation or cancel within 48 hours, then there will be no refund given.
Hervey Bay Flashpackers management reserves the right to amend or cancel reservations without notice. 
ONLY PASSPORT WILL BE ACCEPTED AT CHECK-IN. IF GUESTS HAVE NO PASSPORT, RESERVATION WILL NOT BE HONORED.
Check in time is 2pm.
 Arrivals prior to this time can access common facilities until the room is ready. 
No refund for early check outs. 
Special conditions apply for reservations between the 15th Dec to 15th Jan. Rates are subject to change due to active specials, peak/off peak seasons and special events. Please see specials tab.
Checkout is 10am.
 A late fee applies for departures after the stipulated time.  
Luggage store is available. 
We will attempt to accommodate date-changes but cannot guarantee bed availability. 
Extensions are also subject to availability. 
If extensions require you to move beds a $10 cleaning fee may apply. 
We are a non smoking facility.
 Smoking inside the building will result in a cancellation of your booking, 
No refund will be given. 
Smoking area is provided outside of the building. 
We reserve the right to refuse entry to any person deemed by our staff as being disruptive to other guests and or staff. 
Guests who are being disruptive will be asked to leave the premises. 
Any incidental damages caused during your stay will be charged to the credit card given at the time of the booking.given at the time of the booking.

houseRules.notes:
General Policy

HERVEY BAY FLASHPACKERS TERMS & CONDITIONS  Cancellations made 48h prior to the date of your arrival will be charged 1 night .

To enjoy your stay to the fullest, please read carefully and: -

Confirm that you have a Valid Passport, as per our policies, for check-in. Driver licences or National ID are not accepted.
In case of late check-in (after 9:30pm), please provide a copy of it at info@flashpackersherveybay.com as soon as possible to ensure you will find your keys on arrival; -

Confirm your estimated arrival time; - Take note we run shuttle service ($5 per person each way for Greyhound bus pick-ups and drop-offs at 10:00 AM and 5:00 PM. $10 per person for transfers outside these hours. Airport transfers are also available for $10 per person.)

Let us know if we can expect you!

Furthermore, kindly be advised:

-Reception hours are 7am to 10pm

-Check-ins are strictly from 2pm onward

-Check-outs are strictly within 10am

If checking out before 7am, please sign the check-out register on the previous day and leave your keys in our mailbox the next morning - non returned keys will result in a $25 charge; -

**Please note that only guests under 35 years are allowed in shared dormitories.

Locked luggage storage is available for $5 during the day , $10/night;

If you are arriving by car, feel free to check parking availability in our parking lot before coming in for check-in; -

We can book tours for you to Explore K’Gari/Fraser Island – feel free to inquire at our desk!

Do not hesitate to contact us with any further questions you may have.
